channel.title: Sobremesa en Milliways
channel.description: Recent content on Sobremesa en Milliways

item.title: About
item.author: pablo.palazon@gmail.com (Pablo Palazon)
item.description: I’m Pablo Palazon. And this is my personal website. Why do I write on my own website?. I’d like to write several articles and essays in English to improve my skills. I like STEM affairs such as space, technology, physics and computer science. I’m not an expert or guru on STEM, but it’s a good idea to write about something that you want to learn. So that, if you find out any mistake or something is misunderstand, please contact me or comment.

item.title: Testing ox-hugo
item.author: pablo.palazon@gmail.com (Pablo Palazon)
item.description:
This is a test for ox-hugo exports

LaTeX formatted equation: \( E = -J \sum_{i=1}^N s_i s_{i+1} \)

If \(a^2=b\) and \( b=2 \), then the solution must be either \[ a=+\sqrt{2} \] or \[ a=-\sqrt{2} \]

\begin{equation} \label{eq:1} C = W\log_{2} (1+\mathrm{SNR}) \end{equation}

item.title: Multi-environment maven war generation
item.author: pablo.palazon@gmail.com (Pablo Palazon)
item.description: I’d like to let you an Maven snippet code for configure WAR project for different environments. Sometimes, we’re developing in a dev environment, but this project we’d like to run in another environments (cloud, server, etc).

item.title: First post from ox-hugo
item.author: pablo.palazon@gmail.com (Pablo Palazon)
item.description:
This is my first export from ox-hugo

I’m using One post per Org subtree for posts with org-mode.

item.title: Guake Base 16 Color
item.author: pablo.palazon@gmail.com (Pablo Palazon)
item.description: Base16 provides carefully chosen syntax highlighting and a default set of sixteen colors suitable for a wide range of applications. Base16 is both a color scheme and a template.

item.title: My org mode configuration
item.author: pablo.palazon@gmail.com (Pablo Palazon)
item.description: This is my personal list with most used commands on org-mode. It’s contains snippets, shortcuts and configurations.
